title: Jettison
creator_credit: Adrian Rose and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
brief_description: Abstract shapes, distorted figures jettison on and off the screen metamorphosing to the rhythmic beat of “The Deadly art of knowledge” by Chris MacKellar. A vibrant celebration of the potential of animated forms to constantly move, change and surprise. Obtained an Honourable Mention in the Australian Panorama section of Australian International Animation Festival
